name: Jennifer Nicholson
text: My husband loves Pizza Hut, but not worth the price without the special. It was so much for a pizza. Now that they have the $5 each as long as you get 2 or more things, that's a great deal! We go a few times a week.

name: Shelby Simko
text: Foods good, they always forget my drinks and dipping sauces when we order delivery and never redeliver it, they will give you store credit that you can't use when ordering online......and they never have a driver to deliver for lunch, they ‚Ä¶More

name: Jane Feightner
text: The employees were arguing in the kitchen. The garlic knots were terrible....no cheese in them at all. Waitress said, "Oh, that always happens." $37.00 for garlic knots, one pizza, and 2 diet Cokes. Not worth it at all.

name: Jon Doe
text: The name says it all best pizza in town.

name: Louise Cooley
text: The pizza is the best I've ever had.

name: Kara Shogan
text: I went in to place and order to go and the lady at the counter who took my order was SUPER great at her job. So friendly and awesome. My order was perfect and delicious

name: Katie Boone
text: The service was exceptional! They let me call ahead with order for dine-in. Everything was ready when we got there. Everyone was exceptionally friendly. Stayed on top of drink refills and anything we needed. Excellent, excellent, excellent! We will definitely be coming back here. :)

name: Betty Digruttolo
text: Wanted a half hour after,seating ourselves. No one acknowledged we had came in even though they walked past us numerous times. On waiter kept wiping his nose on his,hand, did not wash his hands. We finally,just left.

name: Paul Carfang
text: Nathan was a great server.  $5 menu is awesome!

name: Terri Shields
text: I just love Pizza Hut Pan Pizzas, especially the Meat Lovers. But it is always empty. That makes for not a fun place to visit.
